pages.text: Space suits provide portable oxygen and protection from hostile environments. There are three tiers of space suits, each offering different levels of protection and capabilities.
$(bold)Basic Space Suit$()$(br)$(br)The standard space suit provides oxygen and basic protection. Consists of helmet, suit, pants, and boots. Sufficient for most airless environments.
$(bold)Netherite Space Suit$()$(br)$(br)Advanced suit with netherite plating. Provides better protection and is fireproof. Ideal for dangerous environments with extreme conditions.
$(bold)Jet Suit$()$(br)$(br)The ultimate space suit with built-in jet propulsion. Allows flight in space. Requires Nitrogen gas for flight.

pages.title: Oxygen Tanks
pages.text: Space suits require oxygen tanks to function:$(br)$(br)- Insert filled oxygen tanks into suit slots$(br)- Tanks slowly deplete as you breathe$(br)- Replace empty tanks with full ones$(br)- Always carry spare tanks!$(br)$(br)Check JEI for oxygen tank crafting and filling.
